Module count
Package count.gui

Class UncaughtExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
count.gui.UncaughtExceptionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
public class UncaughtExceptionHandler
extends Object
implements Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
Class for handling exception via a popup dialog that gives the details.

  • Field Details

    • app

      private final AppFrame app

    • num_caught_exceptions

      private int num_caught_exceptions
      Internal counter for number of exceptions caught.

    • TOO_MANY_EXCEPTIONS

      private static final int TOO_MANY_EXCEPTIONS
      Cutoff for too many exceptions. When multiple exceptions are handled and the pop-up windows start to pile up (counted by num_caught_exceptions, the executable simply quits.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • UncaughtExceptionHandler

      UncaughtExceptionHandler​(AppFrame app)

  • Method Details

    • uncaughtException

      public void uncaughtException​(Thread thread, Throwable T)
      Calls handle(Throwable, String) with this error.
      Specified by:
      uncaughtException in interface Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
      Parameters:
      thread - where the exception was thrown
      T - the exception that was thrown

    • handle

      public void handle​(Throwable E, String title)
      Pop-up dialog for generic error message. This should be called from within the Event Dispatch Thread.
      Parameters:
      E - the exception that is reported here
      title - title for the dialog window

    • handle

      public void handle​(Throwable E, String title, String more_info)
      Pop-up dialog for generic error message. This should be called from within the Event Dispatch Thread.
      Parameters:
      E - the exception that is reported here
      title - title for the dialog window
      more_info - Additional information about the error
